message:
Web Designer required in Riyadh

Responsibilities:
1-Create cross-browser, cross-platform compatible HTML/XHTML/HTML5 websites.
2- Convert Photoshop layouts into HTML.
3- Managing and updating website content.
4-Develop/implement needed animation of webpage elements using modern JavaScript frameworks (JQuery).
Skills:
1- Experience in HTML, XHTML, CSS.
2- In-depth knowledge in HTML5+CSS3+JQuery implementations.
3- Working experience in the implementation of modern JavaScript frameworks (JQuery).
4- Experience in User Interface and Web design programs.

If you are interested, please send your CV to HR@tp.net.sa

data.message:
Hi Ezz, I would like to invite you to read the Group Description and Policy as we don't allow Duplicate posts.
